name: Big Data and Cloud Architecture
body:
### Big Data and Cloud Architecture
I work on and speak about these topics: Cloud - AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud and Rackspace.  Big Data - Hadoop, NoSQL and RDBMS topics.  These include Cloudera Hadoop, Cassandra, MongoDB, Aerospike and Neo4j and also SQL Server.  

I am also the co-founder of the public non-profit, 'Teaching Kids Programming'.

Contact me via twitter - @LynnLangit.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
